content:
rust-analyzer build fails with the above llvm-error in rust-lang/rust: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74813#issuecomment-664235774

Who would be the right person to ping about figuring out how to fix this?
Ah, it also happens on dist-riscv64-linux which seems like an importatn detail
Maybe a too small code model is used there?
